parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if client has Map enabled in [[description.ext]] (''showMap'' param) or force enabled with [[showMap]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownMap'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[shownMap]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "You have Map enabled"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showMap]], [[visibleMap]], [[forceMap]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownUAVFeed]], [[shownHUD]]
</value></part></template>
